#include<stdio.h>
main()
{
      int t;
      scanf("%d",&t);
      while(t--)
      {
                int x;
                scanf("%d",&x);
                if(x&1)
                x=x-1;
                x=x/2;
                int a,b;
                a=x/2;
                b=x-a;
                printf("%d\n",a*b);
      }
}
